description: Take the stress out of weeknight cooking with this quick burger recipe. Served in a jumbo roll, grilled Cajun-spiced chicken thigh fillets are loaded with carrot, spinach and aioli for the ultimate flavour explosion.
name: Cajun Chicken Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 350g Woolworths RSPCA approved chicken thigh fillets, fat trimmed
4 Woolworths crusty jumbo lunch rolls, halved, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 3 minutes on each side or until cooked through.
To assemble burgers, spread half of the aioli over roll bases. Top with chicken, remaining aioli, carrot and spinach. Sandwich with roll tops and serve.
